testcase.name: 1. Cheapest first sorting of Train results
testcase.system-out: Given I search for route from "Berlin, Deutschland" to "Prag, Tschechien" on "20" of next month.passed When I sort by cheapest price...............................................passed And I select results for "train"............................................passed Then I should see a price sorted options with cheapest first................passed
